pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, May 18, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, May 18, 2016:

Ottawa

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting.

12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the President of the European Parliament, His Excellency Martin Schulz.

Centre Block, Office of the Prime Minister
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity only


2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

3:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will make a formal apology in the House of Commons for the Komagata Maru incident.

6:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of British Columbia, Christy Clark.

Centre Block, Office of the Prime Minister
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity only


7:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver brief remarks at the Komagata Maru Apology Reception.

Sir John A. Macdonald Building
144 Wellington Street
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open media coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 6:30 p.m.


PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
